title: Have any popular novels come from a NaNoWriMo event? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, there are a lot of popular novels that have come out from NaNoWriMo. Some of these are: The Night Circus by Erin Morgenstern, Water for Elephants by Sara Gruen, The Beautiful Land by Alan Averill, Fangirl by Rainbow Rowell, Wool by Hugh Howey, The Forest of Hands and Teeth by Carrie Ryan, Don't Let Me Go by J.H.Trimble, The God Patent by Ransom Stephens.

Some relatively popular novels have come from NaNoWriMo, probably most notably "The Night Circus" by Erin Morgenstern, "Water for Elephants," and Rainbow Rowell's "Fangirl."  Rowell was already a published author, but I believe the other two were first-timers.

Several very popular books have been written during NaNoWriMo. The Night Circus Water for ElephantsWoolCinderThe Beautiful LandFangirlThe Forest of Hands and TeethThe Hungry Season Plus hundreds of successful but less well known novels.
